Watching from the shadows, the autobot observed the new arrival.

"Megatron?" he thought to himself.

His gaze was suddenly drawn to a new spectacle.  Looking up at the
moon, he suddenly observed a great black cloud erupting from it.

OOC: Relay is a floating city, so the view is no doubt more impressive
from here.

On Thu, Mar 6, 2008 at 3:12 AM, chiyohakuryuu <chiyohakuryuu@...> wrote:
>
>
>
>
>
>
> OOC: Okay, going to get back to posting here. Lets see how things
>  turn out.
>
>  Megatron X:
>
>  After much study and paitent waiting, three aircraft; two about the
>  size of an average maximal and the third signifigantly smaller-
>  infiltrated the city from three different directions. The largest
>  rumbled down a thouroghfair, almost a block in shape. At it's bow
>  was a large barreled fusion cannon wile the top portion contained two
>  secondary cannons on either side of a twin missile pod. The second
>  aircraft; noticably faster, was set apart by its air foils and two
>  precision beam rifles. The last, was tiny by comparison, flying high
>  over the building until it dove down to join the other two.
>
>  Once the three craft converged, they combinded into an even larger
>  ship, the small flyer compacting and fitting inside the faster flyer,
>  which connected to the bow section of the larger gunship. The ship
>  hovered over an intersection for several minutes as a crowd gather
>  around it. And then it suddenly fell.
>
>  But before it crashed to the roadway, it transformed. The cannons
>  fell away and reconfigured as the body reformed. The large engines
>  formed strong legs. The wings and forward fuselage formed the upper
>  body and arms, with the wings forming two broad shields at the
>  shoulders. The fusion cannon attached to the bottom of the right
>  forearm, while the twin barreled rifle found home in the left hand.
>  With missiles to protect his back, Megatron X Stood before the crowd
>  and sneered.
>
>  "People of the world, Megatron has returned!"
>
>
